Package negotiation

package negotiation
The negotiation package provides classes for managing negotiation systems and handling negotiation-related functionality. It includes components for negotiation management, systems, questions, and options.

The main classes in this package are:

  • NegotiationManager - Manages the overall negotiation process and interactions.
  • NegotiationSystem - Implements the core logic for a negotiation system in the application.
  • Opcion - Represents an option in a negotiation question, providing choices for negotiation responses.
  • Pregunta - Represents a question in a negotiation, including options and possible outcomes.
  • PreguntaJson - Represents a question in a negotiation loaded from JSON data.

NegotiationManager serves as a central component for managing the negotiation process, handling interactions, and coordinating negotiations between different entities in the game.

NegotiationSystem implements the core logic for a negotiation system, providing methods and functionality for negotiating with in-game entities.

Opcion represents an option in a negotiation question, allowing for different responses or choices that the player or other entities can make during a negotiation.

Pregunta represents a question in a negotiation, including options and possible outcomes. It encapsulates the structure of a negotiation question and provides methods for handling responses.

PreguntaJson represents a question in a negotiation loaded from JSON data. It allows for dynamic loading of negotiation questions from external sources.

Each class in this package contributes to the modeling and management of negotiations within the application. For detailed information about each class, refer to their respective documentation.

Since:
2023-11-27
